arts.ttl: Fiorentina’s Pradè criticises Italiano’s attitude after Bologna defeat
arts.sum: Following Fiorentina's disappointing 1-0 loss to Bologna, sporting director Daniele Pradè expressed his dissatisfaction with the team's performance and the attitude of head coach Vincenzo Italiano. arts.sum: Bologna secured a crucial 1-0 win against Fiorentina at the Stadio Dall'Ara, halting the Viola's impressive nine-match winning streak in Serie A. The post Serie A | Bologna 1-0 Fiorentina: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Jens Odgaard scores winner for Bologna to end Fiorentina's winning run in Italian league
arts.sum: Bologna striker Jens Odgaard scored the winner Sunday in a 1-0 win against Fiorentina, ending the Florence-based club’s eight-match winning run in the Italian league. After a balanced first half, Bologna was the better side after the interval and had several occasions to score — including Santiago Castro hitting the post — before it eventually broke the deadlock when Odgaard made the most of a loose ball in the box to score his third league goal.
